Is tofu healthy for me ?

Yes, tofu is healthy! It's a great plant-based protein source, low in calories, and rich in iron, calcium, and isoflavones (which may benefit heart health). Opt for minimally processed varieties. If you have thyroid issues, moderate intake due to its goitrogenic properties. Generally, a nutritious choice!

berapa kalori ayam goreng 1 potong

Ayam goreng 1 potong (sekitar 100-120 gram) mengandung sekitar **250-300 kcal**, tergantung cara memasak dan bagian ayam. Jika digoreng dengan banyak minyak, kalori bisa lebih tinggi.  

Perhatikan juga alergi susu (dairy) jika ayam dibumbui dengan mentega atau krim.
